function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reinforcement of stereotypical car discourses and class distinctions by EVs and EV marketing","Impact":"Perpetuation of social inequalities and limiting the accessibility of sustainable transportation","Mitigation":"Promotion of diverse narratives and targeted marketing to counter stereotypes, and implementation of policies to make EVs more accessible to all socioeconomic groups","Technologies":"Diverse and inclusive marketing strategies, and innovative financing and subsidy programs for EV adoption","People":"Society at large, particularly those susceptible to negative stereotypes and affected by class distinctions","Owner":"Marketing and advertising companies, policymakers, and organizations advocating for social equality"},{"Description":"Potential rebound effects of EVs leading to increased emissions and environmental impact","Impact":"Undermining the environmental benefits of EVs and contributing to climate change","Mitigation":"Strict regulations, incentives for sustainable behavior, and investment in infrastructure to support the environmentally friendly use of EVs","Technologies":"Smart grids, sustainable energy sources, and emission monitoring technologies","People":"General public, environmental organizations, and regulatory bodies","Owner":"Government agencies, environmental advocacy groups, and companies involved in energy and transportation infrastructure"},{"Description":"Impact of EVs on oil independence and global oil dependency","Impact":"Shifts in global oil market dynamics and potential geopolitical instability","Mitigation":"Diversification of energy sources, strategic energy policies, and international cooperation to reduce dependency on oil","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, energy storage systems, and energy efficiency solutions","People":"Oil-producing countries, global energy consumers, and policymakers","Owner":"Energy firms, national governments, and international organizations"}]}
